author: Lesley Waters
method: Mix all of the ingredients together except for the oil. Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Place a large spoonful of the mixture in the pan.  Fry for 2-3 minutes on each side or until crisp and golden.  Repeat with the rest of the mixture. Drain on some kitchen paper and serve.
ingredients: 1 onion, sliced,  2 tbsp plain flour,  1 free-range egg,  1 tbsp curry powder,  1 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt,  oil for frying
